name: [Prototype] KAMFER
description:
A small month project during January 2017 when I was still studying at college, just to improve my skills in C# and Maya. The aim was making a 90's style FPS in the vein of Quake 2. The prototype has one small level that contains the following:

- Patrolling and spawning AI 

- Melee, Assault and Sniper enemy types

- Player weapons and pickups

- Swimming and traversal

- Scripted events and level layout

- Custom  GUI's and music

- 90's aesthetic 

Player Controls:

WASD - Movement

Mouse - Look and shoot

Space and C - Jump and swim up/down
